thread.title: Tom, Silsoe
thread.title_full: Country Attire Ltd. (www.countryattire.com) reviewed by Tom, Silsoe

author: Tom, Silsoe
title: Tom, Silsoe
text: I spent a long time looking for an online retailer which had a good returns policy. Not only does Country Attire have that but they also had the best price I could find online with next working day delivery; couldn't be happier.
